LanguageData.VanyaES_R017s.label: V-R0/17 Revolution
LanguageData.VanyaES_R017s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. V-R0/17 equips the top microspace transition engine - R0. It helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. V-R0/17 has unparalleled comprehensive maneuverability and close combat defense. This shield will play an amazing role under the control of the fighters.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R3is.label: V-R3i Bullfrog
LanguageData.VanyaES_R3is.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. V-R3i equips the low cost microspace transition engine - R3. This shield helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. It's equipped with automatic fire foam burster and an improved man-machine system. Bullfrog is usually offered to workers.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R4s.label: V-R4 Alert
LanguageData.VanyaES_R4s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. V-R4 equips the microspace transition engine - R1. This shield helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. Alerts is usually provided to combat forces.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R8s.label: V-R8 Mirage
LanguageData.VanyaES_R8s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. V-R8 equips the enhanced microspace transition engine - R1 plus. This shield helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. V-R8 is equipped with automatic fire foam burster and a temperature control system. The shield can be forced to reactivate by consuming hit points when it is broken. Mirage is usually provided to elite units.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R9bs.label: V-R9b Rocket Angel
LanguageData.VanyaES_R9bs.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. V-R9b equips the microspace transition engine - R1. This shield helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. V-R9b is equipped with a mental attack immune system. It releases smoke when it is broken. Rocket Angel is usually provided to elite units.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R4ds.label: V-R4dd Alert D
LanguageData.VanyaES_R4ds.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. One-time shield. The shield will disappear when the energy is exhausted. V-R4 equips the microspace transition engine - R1. This shield helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. This one-time shield reduces costs.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R8hs.label: V-R8h Mirage SE
LanguageData.VanyaES_R8hs.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. Special edition. V-R8 equips the enhanced microspace transition engine - R1 plus. This shield helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. V-R8E reduces costs by simplifying the design. Mirage SE is popular with fighters because of better price-quality ratio.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R9ds.label: V-R9dd Rocket Angel D
LanguageData.VanyaES_R9ds.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. One-time shield. The shield will disappear when the energy is exhausted. V-R9b equips the microspace transition engine - R1. This shield helps the user completely avoid enemy attacks by phase shifting. V-R9b is equipped with a mental attack immune system. It releases smoke when it is broken. Rocket Angel D is popular with fighters because of better price-quality ratio.
LanguageData.VanyaES_R10s.label: V-R10 Empire Angel
LanguageData.VanyaES_R10s.description: Vanya energy shield belt. Revolutionary series. The shield of fighter. V-R10 was developed based on the experience of V-R9 Rocket Angel. Only elite troops will equip it.
